title: 3 Easy Ways to Share an Entire OneNote Notebook With Anyone

steps.title: Open the OneNote app.
steps.content: Open the OneNote app. This looks like a purple notebook icon. OneNote is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . You must be logged into your Microsoft account to use OneNote.

steps.title: Tap a notebook.
steps.content: Tap a notebook. If you aren't already on the Notebooks tab, tap it at the bottom-left corner. You should see a list of all opened notebooks.

steps.title: Tap ••• in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap ••• in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Share Notebook.
steps.content: Tap Share Notebook . This will be above Settings .

steps.title: Tap Invite People to Notebook.
steps.content: Tap Invite People to Notebook . You'll be able to input the email address(es) for those with whom you want to share. Alternatively, tap Copy Link to Notebook to share the notebook with a custom link, similar to sharing Google Docs .

steps.title: Enter an email address and tap Send.
steps.content: Enter an email address and tap Send . If you want the recipient to have permission to add or remove anything in the notebook, toggle on Can Edit . The notebook will be shared with the recipient.

steps.title: Open OneNote for Windows 10.
steps.content: Open OneNote for Windows 10. This looks like a purple notebook icon. If you're using Windows 11, this will look like OneNote for Windows . OneNote is also available as a separate app for Windows. [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click a notebook.
steps.content: Click a notebook. To open a notebook, click the book icon in the left panel, and then click More Notebooks…

steps.title: Click Share.
steps.content: Click Share . You can find this in the toolbar at the top-right corner. The Share panel will open on the right.

steps.title: Enter an email address and click Share.
steps.content: Enter an email address and click Share . If you want the recipient to have permission to add or remove anything in the notebook, click the drop-down menu and select Can edit . The notebook will be shared with the recipient.

steps.title: Sign into https://www.onenote.com/hrd in a web browser.
steps.content: Sign into https://www.onenote.com/hrd in a web browser. You'll need to use your Microsoft account email and password. This method will work on Windows and Mac computers.

steps.title: Click a notebook.
steps.content: Click a notebook. You should see a list of all notebooks in your Microsoft account. You can create a new one by clicking New .

steps.title: Click Share in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click Share in the top-right corner. This will be underneath your profile picture. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Share Entire Notebook.
steps.content: Click Share Entire Notebook . A pop-up menu will open. Alternatively, click Copy Link to Notebook to share the notebook with a custom link.

steps.title: Enter a name, group, or email address.
steps.content: Enter a name, group, or email address. OneNote will suggest related or added contacts if available. If you want the recipient to have permission to add or remove anything in the notebook, click the drop-down menu and select Can edit .

steps.title: Click Send.
steps.content: Click Send . The notebook will be shared with the recipient.
